tasks.label: my task
tasks.command: gcc -g main.c Basic.c Evaluator.c Game_AI.c Hash_Table.c Initialization.c Move_Generator.c Search_Engine.c Sort.c test.c  trial.c UI.c Interact.c Run.c Record.c -o main -I /usr/local/Cellar/sdl2/2.0.10/include  -L  /usr/local/Cellar/sdl2/2.0.10/lib  -lSDL2 -I /usr/local/Cellar/sdl2_image/2.0.5/include -L /usr/local/Cellar/sdl2_image/2.0.5/lib -lSDL2_image -I /usr/local/Cellar/sdl2_ttf/2.0.15/include -L /usr/local/Cellar/sdl2_ttf/2.0.15/lib -lSDL2_ttf
